total_subquestions_ys: Q1: Identify the row that is filled with the same number (in this case, 1).
Q2: Remove all rows above and below the identified row.
Q3: Identify the columns that contain the number 1 in the remaining grid.
Q4: Remove all columns that do not contain the number 1.
Q5: The remaining grid is the output grid.
